#include <stdio.h>
 
 
long long int mod=1000000007; 

long long int p_cal(long long int x, long long int y)
{
    long long int temp;
    if( y == 0)
        return 1;
    temp = p_cal(x, y/2);
    if (y%2 == 0)
        return (temp*temp)%mod;
    else
        return (((x*temp)%mod)*temp)%mod;
}


 
int main()
{
  long long int n,T,p,ans,x=2; 
  scanf("%lld",&T);
  while(T--)
  {
	  scanf("%lld",&n);
  	  p=p_cal(2,n-1);
  	  printf("%lld\n",p);
 }
  return 0;
}
